Wanderer’s Advice.In-game Description: Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

Adventurer’s Experience.In-game Description: Character EXP material. Gives 5000 EXP.These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

Hero’s Wit.In-game Description: Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.
